ing: 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "This is my mother's recipe that she always made for Christmas but you could also have it for Valentines Day or any day! Sometimes I use the light versions of the cream cheese and frozen whipped topping. It is just as delicious as the regular version."
ins:
In an electric mixer, beat the cream cheese and the powdered sugar until combined. Add vanilla and beat 2 minutes. Gently fold in whipped topping.
Transfer mixture into the pie crust. Top the filling with the cherries. Refrigerate for at least one hour before serving.
